abstracts.cdata!:
The project is designed to support a
            program for the development of labor-intensive Small and
            Medium Scale Industry (SMI) through lines of credit to Sinai
            Yatirim ve Kredi Bankasi (SYKB) (US$80 million) and Halk
            Bankasi (HB) (US$18.4 million) and technical assistance for
            the institutional strengthening and efficiency improvement
            of HB (US$0.35 million) and technical assistance to SMI
            enterprises (US$1.25 million) through the Small Industry
            Development Organization (SIDO). It would: (i) provide part
            of the foreign exchange requirements of SYKB and HB over
            1986-88 for onlending to SMI, with special emphasis on small
            scale industries; and (ii) finance a program of technical
            assistance to SMI.
